blackthorns.name: The Blackthorn Pact
blackthorns.desc: A secretive coven of forest inhabitants who protect the forest's dark secrets.

cold-bloods.name: Cold-Bloods
cold-bloods.desc: The Cold Bloods are an organized crime syndicate operating in town, primarily through the tavern.

cult.name: No Purpose Cult
cult.desc: A small group of radical conspiracy theorists who are obsessed with the idea that they have no free will or agency, and are all being secretly controlled by a being known as The Game Master.

dragon-council.name: Dragon Council
dragon-council.desc: The Dragon Council is a recent addition to the city. While a few people have connected the dots, most people haven't realized yet that the dragons are siphoning resources from the city.

goblins.name: Red Goblins
goblins.desc: A bunch of goblins who live in a camp in the Red Mountains

hikers.name: Hikers
hikers.desc: A group of hikers who like to go hiking in the nearby Red Mountains.

swarm.name: The Swarm
swarm.desc: The Insectoids are a newer gang in town, starting to cause problems late at night. They're experiencing a parasitic pandemic amongst themselves back in their home realm.

rednecks.name: Rednecks
rednecks.desc: A group of kobolds who live in the trailer park near The Red Mountains. They are known for their love of ale and barbequed meats.

pirates.name: Pirates
pirates.desc: The pirates have been harbored in Tableton Dock for a few weeks now.

school.name: School
school.desc: All attendees of Tableton Academy, student or staff.

tavern-workers.name: Tavern Workers
tavern-workers.desc: A lot of people in the town make their money through the town's tavern.
